amendment.description: To provide funding for grants to States for smallpox and other bioterrorism inoculation activities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 474 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 474 proposed by Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S4742-4747, S4752; text: CR S4742) To provide funding for grants to States for smallpox and other bioterrorism inoculation activities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 474 proposed by Senator Bayh.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 474 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
